page.title: 04ATTITUDES OF THE PEOPLE
page.content: The people in this area do not reveal their private affairs very readily e.g. to a question concerning political support{60%}replied{"NO {COMMENT"}. In this area there is a great feeling towards traditional views e.g. the home & family life and socialising in groups.This is probably a result of the mining and iron making background of this area i.e. unity in the struggle. With the change in the economic background with the disappearance of these industries this could change.There is also a strong underlying feeling of belonging to a part of the area e.g. to Cambusnethan, Newmains, Greenhead, Morningside, Coltness, Waterloo.There is also a {"Them and Us "}feeling between local authority and private housing people this might change as more local auth. people enter the private market.
